speaker: President.
english: President. − The next item is the report ( A6-0256/2008 ) by Mr A. Foglietta, on behalf of the Committee on the Environment, Public Health and Food Safety, on the White Paper on ‘A Strategy for Europe on Nutrition, Overweight and Obesity related health issues’ ( 2007/2285(INI) ).
original: President. − The next item is the report ( A6-0256/2008 ) by Mr A. Foglietta, on behalf of the Committee on the Environment, Public Health and Food Safety, on the White Paper on ‘A Strategy for Europe on Nutrition, Overweight and Obesity related health issues’ ( 2007/2285(INI) ).
agenda_item: White Paper on Nutrition, Overweight and Obesity-related health issues (debate)
